credentials: PHD 2012 Univ of California Los Angeles
name: Haley Vlach

ratings.comment: Dr. Vlach is super into what she teaches and is very enthusiastic. Very nice and super fair. Lectures could get a bit long at times, but all the content was interesting and I learned a lot! I would definitely recommend taking this class. 4 easy multiple choice exams in the class and you get to drop the lowest score. Must attend lecture for points.
Haley is a good a lecturer, but sometimes her pace is too slow. Her lectures featured videos, which was good! Class was participation and 4 exams, and she lets you drop one!
The things on her slides are what is on the test. Videos during lecture are helpful. Gives a study guide for each exam.

You do not need to do the readings so don't waste your money on a book! If you go to lectures you will do fine on the exam.  Love her teaching style and just her overall, she is so cute and genuinely wants her students to do well.  If you are taking Ed Psych 320 take it with her!
Reading is completely unnecessary, but helpful if you really want an A. Everything you need to know is clearly written down and spelled out in the lecture powerpoints. Unbelievably easy.

Kind of boring and repetitive lectures. Good video examples and she does a good job at explaining things in detail. Average tests, hard to fail but hard to get an A. Drops your lowest exam score which is a nice buffer. Overall, decent class.
Easy class so lectures can get kind of boring. I would recommend this class to anyone of any major.

I would reccomend anyone ti take this class. As long as you attend lecture you will recieve easy attendance points and after paying  attention in lecture the tests are straight foward. She is a great teacher and it is easy to listen to her lectures. Take this class!!!

Great class! One presentation, weekly class readings, and a final paper. Attendance is mandatory and part of your grade. Easy to get an A if you complete all assignments. The professor is brilliant; she is good at creating an interesting discussion. She is also really young; maybe skipped college? Def deserves a chili pepper!
Dr. Vlach is hilarious (and easy on the eyes!).

Great class. Very clear and explains significance of material. Uses engaging videos. Some of the class is dry. 3 multiple choice exams, optional cumulative final to replace lowest score. A couple points of extra credit.
Very easy class! Take it if you have the chance! Go to lecture and you will do great.

Great professor! Her class is extremely interesting. Attendance is definitely mandatory, as she makes you turn in question answers at the end of every lecture. Her exams are very simple and easy if you study. The book is helpful but definitely not necessary to read unless you aren't understanding a concept. Exams are all based on lecture material.
